title: South African Airways Vacations® Offers Cape Town Air & Hotel Package For Only $1,299* (restrictions apply)
text:
South African Airways Vacations
"Cape Town Winter Warmer" package offers exceptional value and savings of $700 per person
FORT LAUDERDALE, Fla. , Oct. 15, South African Airways Vacations® (SAA Vacations®) launched the "Cape Town Winter Warmer" package . This value-packed offer includes round-trip international flights from New York – JFK or Washington, DC -Dulles to Cape Town , 5 nights hotel accommodation, daily breakfast, airport transfers and Hop-on Hop-off bus tour of the city, from only $1,299* per person (restrictions apply). Travel is applicable through December 9, 2015 and also, January 12-25, 2016 and February 12-March 31, 2016 . The "Cape Town Winter Warmer" offers savings of up to $700 per person off similar air-inclusive packages.
In addition to these special savings, American travelers can take advantage of a very favorable exchange rate on a vacation in South Africa . The "Cape Town Winter Warmer" is the perfect escape from the winter and now more than ever, South Africa offers tremendous value for money.
"Our newest package is the best way to enjoy Cape Town's long warm summer days," said Terry von Guilleaume , President of South African Airways Vacations®. "Cape Town Winter Warmer is one of the best value packages on the market, and the ideal opportunity to discover one the most popular destinations for international travel at the moment."
Cape Town is on everyone's bucket list and has consistently been voted as one of the most beautiful cities in the world by leading travel publications. With its natural beauty, pristine beaches, rich heritage, stunning wine region and its famous international cuisine, Cape Town is a perfect combination of nature, culture, adventure, food and wine. Popular attractions include Table Mountain, Robben Island , Victoria & Alfred Waterfront and lively neighborhoods with local jazz clubs and the opportunity to enjoy numerous culinary experiences. The scenic drive to Cape Point and the Cape of Good Hope will lend itself to some of the most breath-taking scenery in Africa and lead you to the African Penguin Colony at Boulders Beach.
There has never been a more affordable time to experience the beauty of Cape Town . Travelers are encouraged to contact SAA Vacations'® Africa Specialists to take advantage of the "Cape Town Winter Warmer" package, at 1-855-FLY-SAAV or their professional travel consultant. To discover more SAA Vacations® packages to South Africa and other destinations throughout Africa , visit: www.flysaa.com .
About South African Airways Vacations ®
A division of South African Airways (SAA), the national airline of South Africa and Africa's most awarded airline, SAA Vacations® is highly regarded for its wide array of affordable luxury packages to Africa and uses SAA's extensive route network to create packages for travel throughout South Africa , Botswana , Victoria Falls , Namibia , Mozambique , Zambia , Zimbabwe , and East Africa . The program is managed and fulfilled by Destination Southern Africa (DSA), which was founded in 2001 and offers an extensive portfolio of tour programs with a variety of hotels, game lodges and safari companies throughout Southern Africa. DSA was one of three tour operators in the U.S. that was officially appointed by MATCH to develop and sell travel packages for soccer fans visiting South Africa for the FIFA 2010 World Cup, making it a partner with extensive knowledge and know-how in planning the perfect African vacation.
*Terms & Conditions
Price is per person based on double occupancy. Valid as of October 12, 2015 for sales up to December 09, 2015 , for departure from New York (JFK) or Washington, DC (Dulles) between October 02 - December 09, 2015 and January 15 - 25, 2016 and also February 12 - March 31, 2016 with the same itinerary available at higher prices during other travel periods. Subject to availability and currency exchange rate fluctuations. Prices are valid for new bookings only, are not retroactive and may change without notice. Package includes all government and airline imposed taxes and fees. Baggage and optional service fees, cancellation charges and other restrictions may apply.
